text: Curssse thisss deai, and curssse you!
We accept, may thisss deal turn to assshesss in your mouth.
INSSSOLENT CREATURE.... we accept, but begone, NOW!
Deliver unto me what issss mine, sssmothskin, or my Fimm will burn down your villagessss!
Thosse ssspineless Dirach counsseleed me on thisss.
Grovel like a Shearl and accept my benevolence, or elssse.
TAKE THE DEAL, SSSMOTHSKIN! My Fimm hunger for battle and ssslaves...
NEVER!
BEGONE SSSMOTHSKIN!
Ssstupid creature! Run before I make a stew out of you!
Grovel before the Hellmother, ssssmoothskin!
WHICH OF ONE YOU WORTHLESSS SHEARLS LET THISSS ONE IN?
Ssspeak quick, or I'll rip out your liver and eat it in a ssstew!
Asss you ssse, Mother Skattach isss generous, child.
Very good, my dear.
It isss bad mannersss to refuse aid to one's mother.
As you sssse, my giftsss are plentiful.
Mother hasss prepared a tasssty ssstew for you to eat, after we're done with thisss.
A treat for my favourite child.
Not today, child.
DO NOT BE INSSOLENT, MY DEAR!
Sorry my dear, this isss not the Helmother's desssire.
Wissse of you, sssmothskin.
Yesss, Mother Skattach knows bessst.
My dear child! You ssshouldn't have!
Assss the Hellmother desserves!
A fitting sssacrifice to the Hellmother!
Good child, wait here while Mother Skattach sssearches for a treat...
I will order the Shearl to prepare a feassst in honour of thisss!
Yesss, very well my dear.
TRAITOR! I will ram your tail through your throat!
INSSOLENT SSSPROUT! You dare...!
BETRAYAL, AGAIN! AGAIN!?
Idiot child! IDIOT!
Thisss isss how you repay a kind Mother?
You dissssapoint Skattach, ssprout.
MY FIMM! DESSSTROY THIS INTERLOPER!
Come my warriors! DEFEND YOUR HELLMOTHER.
YOU DARE! YOU DARE?! I WILL EAT YOUR HEART WHEN THISSS IS OVER!
You're no longer of ussse, losst child.
Your usssefullnesss hasss come to an end, sssprout.
My child, thisss is no longer profitable to the Great Hellmother.
HELP ME! PROTECT THE HELLMOTHER MY CHILD!!
My dear! Our cruel foesss dare to attack Mother! Aid me!
March with the Hellmother, and be rewarded, my child.
It isss time for you to repay your dear Mother back, my child.
Accept thisss child, it isss bad mannersss to turn down giftsss from Mother...
Accept this benevolent offer from your Hellmother.
Ssse, child? Skattach isss generoussss....
Go back home, child.
Worthlesss child...
You're no ussse for Mother, begone, sssprout.
Join forcesss with the Hellmother, and we ssshall rule all!
I am a generousss Mother to well-behaved children.
My dear! Join forcesss with Skattach and ssshe will reward you!
SSSTOP; ssstop... pleassse do not harm thisss old crone...
Thisss mussst end, Would you be so cruel asss to remove a Mother from her children?
Peace, yesss? Pleasse my dear child, ssspare this old Meargh, be kind...
The hossstsss of the Hellmother will aid you, my dear.
Mother issss here, child.
My dear child, it isss time for ussss to join you in ssslaughter!
A treat for you my dear.
Mother isss generousss!
Giftsss from your Hellmother!
I am Ssskattach! Hellmother of all Fimir! SSSPEAK!
Kneel before the Hellmother's Throne and I will hear your plea.
Ssspeak, lossst child!
PEACE!? IDIOT SSSPROUT!
My Fimm will drown your envoysss in the bog!
No, my children dessire battle and ssspoils.
NEVER, I RULE! ME! ME!
INSSSOLENCE! NO!
The Hellmother rulessss alone! ALONE!
The Hellmother's punissshment is upon you, sssprout!
MY FIMM, MY CHILDREN; NOW WE KILL AND PLUNDER!
Your people ssshall be our sslavess!!!
Greetingsss my child, tell me, What do you ssseek from the Hellmother?
I am alwaysss generousss to my children, ssspeak your word.
Come, tell Mother Ssskattach about your troublesss my child.
Kroll... must.. accept...
Yes... now... begone... before... I... destroy...
I... accept... but... I... remember...
Give... sacrifice... or... suffer...
Take offer.... Take... Offer... Now...
Accept... or... be... sacrificed...
Accept... pact... or... be... devoured...
No... begone...
Kroll... refuses... insignificant... creature...
Never... you... will... not... trick... Kroll...
Speak... creature... or... perish...
Talk... or be... sacrificed.
Grovel... worship... then Kroll listens...
Yes...Bog-friend.
Kroll... accepts... deal...
A... tribute... to... goddess...
Ally... take... deal...
Your... reward... take it...
Favourable... pact...
Not... acceptable...
Bog-friend.... mistaken...
Kroll... must... reject...
Yes... pact...
Brave... to... bargain... with... Kroll...
Gifts... for... Kroll...
When... I... ascend... reward... you...
My... children... are... ecstatic...
Very... good... Bog-friend...
Kroll... will... remember...
Wise... choice...
Fool... betrayer...
Shortsighted... creature... stupid...
My... wrath... comes...
You... dare...
Beware... my... wrath...
Shortsighted...
You... will... be... devoured... devoured... devoured...
Children... destroy... foes...
I... shall... devour... your... soul...
Useless...
Kroll... doesn't... need... you...
The... pact... is... broken...
Aid us... aid... us...
Help... Kroll... be... rewarded...
Kroll... must... not... be... stopped... help... help... help...
Tribute... and... be... spared...
Kroll... offers... pact...
Accept... and... become... great...
Kroll... brings... offer...
Regrettable...
Reject... Kroll...?
You... chose... poorly...
Together... strong... with Kroll...
Become... family...
Kroll... offers... alliance...
Stop... Kroll... wants... peace...
Mercy... mercy... mercy... mercy...
Stop.... stop... it hurts... it hurts...
Kroll's... children... aid... you...
We... join... the... slaughter...
Together.... we... triumph... we... kill...
Gifts... from... Kroll
Riches... from... the... Bog...
Boons.... from... a... goddess
I.... listen...
I am Kroll.... Goddess of the Marshes...
Ancient... as the world...
No... peace... no... peace...
No... mercy... you... die... become... food...
No... we... kill... kill... kill... kill...
Kroll... mistress... of... her.. destiny...
I... rule... alone....
I... am... superior... I... am... goddess...
You... obstacle... to... ascension...
My... children... need... flesh...
Your... world... sink... into... bog...
Friend... of... Kroll...
Bog-friend....
Ally... speak...
For our survival, yes.
Though I have misgivings, the Meargh deems it so.
They will think me a Shearl. We agree.
We ask for this. If no, we will take what we need.
With lowered tails, we offer this.
You are fit for sacrifice, nothing more, but here is something.
Daemons are summoned. Consider this carefully…
Your people will regret this deal, we will return.
The Meargh bids us no.
You talk too much. Talk, talk, talk! We rot while you chatter!
The mists choke your vision and dull your senses. Do you truly feel safe?
You stumble into our realm. Lost and confused.
Begone from here! These swamps are not for your kind.
The Meargh agrees to these terms.
To survive, to endure, yes.
Slaves and sacrifices are needed. Fimúl's eye demands it.
We offer this in Fimúl's name.
The Fimir come bearing an offer. Will you accept?
For safety and survival. Will you accept, yesssss?
Sadly no. The Meargh says no.
We cannot agree to this, tribe friend.
Fimúlneid does not wish this.
This is what I do. I plant stories in ground, watch them grow into truth.
Brave to deal with Bog Daemons.
We will make fine Belly-Plate from this.
We accept in Fimúlneid's name.
The tribe always has need of sacrifices.
We will chant your name around the fire!
The tribe will remember this great act!
You have the Meargh’s appreciation
And thus you abandon us, just as the four did.
We continue alone, as always.
Betrayal! The tribe won't forget this.
Fimúlneid curse you!
Pathetic, we will survive long after you rot in the ground.
This matters little. We have long endured alone.
We will destroy you, Fimúlneid wills it!
Rally the Fimm! We must fight to endure!
Summon the Dirach. War calls!
This no longer benefits the tribe.
The Meargh deems this ended.
This is lost to the mists.
Our tribe is in danger. Aid us!
Though we wish to be left alone, we need help.
The tribe marches for our survival. Will you join?
Gold! Gold is power! Power to punish other Fimir! Power to rule!
The Meargh asks the tribe to offer you this.
We offer this in Fimúl's name.
The mists extend their offer. Do you accept?
MmmMMMMMMmmm!!
Forget us. Leave us be.
You have nothing of use to us. Begone.
Together we are stronger, no?
We desire sacrifices and more. An agreement?
For our survival, cooperation?
Please, come to the castle. Please. Show them you want peace. Show them you will not harm us. Please, please, please…
A wise shepherd does not cull the entire herd, only what it needs to survive.
We dwindle. The Meargh calls for mercy.
Fimúlneid rises. Together we shall endure.
The eye commands we help you.
Together we will make ruin of our foes and cover their lands in mist.
The tribe offers gifts. Do you accept?
The swamps have many treasures known to us. Forgotten things.
The Meargh extends an offering.
You call us Bog Daemons, we are Fimir. Now talk? Talk.
You have found us in the mists. Now what?
We have existed for many ages. We mean to keep it that way.
No peace. The Dirach call for your destruction!
Ware the mists, they call for your death.
The Fimm desire battle. No!
No. We must continue alone.
The Meargh says no. That is all.
We will survive alone. As we have for millennia.
The eye commands it.
We'll take sacrifices, slaves and more!
The swamps shall swallow your meagre lands!
I speak for the Meargh. Talk
We welcome you in the name of the fiery eye.
From the mists, you emerge. Speak.
